Articles.Content:
Hi all,

way back i built a cool robo arm for my shuttle using scaled down damned robotics parts. Now though i can seem to find something that will fit along 2 fuselages and works well. Could someone point me in the direction of good robotic arm mods?

Thanks

I know the Spaceport is a mess but it isn't unsearchable:

Robotic Arms Pack - Pre-build CanadArm & Buran arm

DROMOMAN - Revised Damned Robotics

I know the Spaceport is a mess but it isn't unsearchable:

Robotic Arms Pack - Pre-build CanadArm & Buran arm

DROMOMAN - Revised Damned Robotics

I have confirmed that Robotic Arms Pack works with .21. Yay!

yeah maybe so but what i have found is that dromoman works but Damned robotics 1.3 does not

Edit: never mind i actually recently got to work with infernal robotics

Edited July 27, 2013 by Helix935
